ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE KAREN HORSMAN, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, to be a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for British Columbia, and a Judge of the Court of Appeal of Yukon.
